id.description: A unique identifier for the employee.

displayName.description: The name to be displayed for the employee.

firstName.description: The first name of the employee.

lastName.description: The last name of the employee.

preferredName.description: The preferred or nickname of the employee.

jobTitle.description: The job title or role of the employee.

workPhone.description: The work phone number of the employee.

mobilePhone.description: The mobile phone number of the employee.

workEmail.description: The work email address of the employee.

department.description: The department in which the employee works.

location.description: The physical location where the employee works.

division.description: The division of the company to which the employee belongs.

linkedIn.description: The LinkedIn profile URL of the employee, if available.

pronouns.description: The preferred pronouns of the employee.

workPhoneExtension.description: The extension number for the employee's work phone line.

supervisor.description: The supervisor or manager of the employee.

photoUploaded.description: Indicates whether a profile photo has been uploaded for the employee.

photoUrl.description: The URL of the employee's profile photo.

canUploadPhoto.description: Indicates whether the employee has permission to upload a profile photo.
